AMO-Tools-Suite  v.0.3.3
Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

SteamProperties.cpp
1 #include "ssmt/SteamSystemModelerTool.h"
2 #include "ssmt/SteamProperties.h"
3 #include "ssmt/SaturatedProperties.h"
4 
5 SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput SteamProperties::calculate() {
6  switch (thermodynamicQuantity_) {
7  case ThermodynamicQuantity::TEMPERATURE:
8  return waterPropertiesPressureTemperature(this->pressure_, this->quantityValue_);
9  case ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTHALPY:
10  return waterPropertiesPressureEnthalpy(this->pressure_, this->quantityValue_);
11  case ThermodynamicQuantity::ENTROPY:
12  return waterPropertiesPressureEntropy(this->pressure_, this->quantityValue_);
13  case ThermodynamicQuantity::QUALITY:
14  return waterPropertiesPressureQuality(this->pressure_, this->quantityValue_);
15  default:
16  return waterPropertiesPressureQuality(this->pressure_, this->quantityValue_);
17  };
18 }
19 
20 SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput SteamProperties::waterPropertiesPressureTemperature(const double p, const double t) {
21  switch (SteamSystemModelerTool::regionSelect(p, t)) {
22  case 1: {
23  auto rv = SteamSystemModelerTool::region1(t, p);
24  rv.quality = 0;
25  return rv;
26  }
27  case 2: {
28  auto rv = SteamSystemModelerTool::region2(t, p);
29  rv.quality = 1;
30  return rv;
31  }
32  case 3: {
33  auto rv = SteamSystemModelerTool::region3(t, p);
34  rv.quality = 0;
35  return rv;
36  }
37  default:
38  break;
39  }
40  return {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
41 };
42 
43 // TODO combine this with waterPropertiesPressureEntropy?
44 SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput SteamProperties::waterPropertiesPressureEnthalpy(const double pressure, const double enthalpy) {
45  double specificEnthalpyLimit = 0;
46  SteamSystemModelerTool::SaturatedPropertiesOutput pressureSatProps;
47  double temperature;
48 
49  if ( pressure < SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_CRIT) {
50  const double temp = SaturatedTemperature(pressure).calculate();
51  pressureSatProps = SaturatedProperties(pressure, temp).calculate();
52  specificEnthalpyLimit = pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy;
53  }
54  if ( pressure > SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_Tp) {
55  const double boundaryTemperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::boundaryByPressureRegion3to2(pressure);
56  auto const boundaryProps = SteamSystemModelerTool::region2(boundaryTemperature, pressure);
57  specificEnthalpyLimit = boundaryProps.specificEnthalpy;
58  }
59 
60  if ( enthalpy < specificEnthalpyLimit ) {
61  SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput region13boundary;
62 
63  if (pressure > SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_Tp) {
64  region13boundary = waterPropertiesPressureTemperature(pressure, SteamSystemModelerTool::TEMPERATURE_Tp);
65  }
66 
67  if (pressure <= SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_Tp || enthalpy < region13boundary.specificEnthalpy) {
68  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEnthalpyRegion1Exact(pressure, enthalpy);
69  return SteamSystemModelerTool::region1(temperature, pressure);
70  }
71 
72  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEnthalpyRegion3(pressure, enthalpy);
73  auto rv = SteamSystemModelerTool::region3(temperature, pressure);
74  rv.quality = -1; // TODO quality question - what should this do?
75  return rv;
76  }
77 
78  if ( (pressure < SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_CRIT) && (enthalpy >= pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy) && (enthalpy <= pressureSatProps.gasSpecificEnthalpy)) {
79  const double quality = (enthalpy - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy) / (pressureSatProps.gasSpecificEnthalpy - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy);
80  const double specificVolume = (pressureSatProps.gasSpecificVolume - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificVolume) * quality + pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificVolume;
81  return {
82  pressureSatProps.temperature, pressure, quality, specificVolume, 1 / specificVolume,
83  /* TODO Density question was commented out -> 1 / (reducedPressure * gibbsPi * t * r / p / 1000.0)}, //density in kg/m³ */
84  enthalpy,
85  (pressureSatProps.gasSpecificEntropy - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEntropy) * quality + pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEntropy,
86  };
87  }
88 
89  if (pressure <= 4) {
90 // temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEnthalpyRegion2A(pressure, enthalpy);
91  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEnthalpyRegion2AExact(pressure, enthalpy);
92  } else {
93  double constants[] = {0.90584278514723E+3, -0.67955786399241, 0.12809002730136E-3};
94 
95  double pressureLine = constants[0] + constants[1] * enthalpy + constants[2] * std::pow(enthalpy, 2);
96  if (pressureLine > pressure) {
97  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEnthalpyRegion2BExact(pressure, enthalpy);
98  } else {
99  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEnthalpyRegion2CExact(pressure, enthalpy);
100  }
101  }
102 
103  return SteamSystemModelerTool::region2(temperature, pressure);
104 };
105 
106 SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput SteamProperties::waterPropertiesPressureEntropy(const double pressure, const double entropy) {
107  SteamSystemModelerTool::SaturatedPropertiesOutput pressureSatProps;
108  double specificEntropyLimit = 0;
109  SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput boundaryProps, region13boundary;
110 
111  if (pressure < SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_CRIT) {
112  double const satTemperature = SaturatedTemperature(pressure).calculate();
113  SaturatedProperties sp = SaturatedProperties(pressure, satTemperature);
114  pressureSatProps = sp.calculate();
115  specificEntropyLimit = pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEntropy;
116  }
117 
118  // this does stuff that determines what the boundary between 2 and 3 is
119  if (pressure > SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_Tp) {
120  const double boundaryTemperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::boundaryByPressureRegion3to2(pressure);
121  boundaryProps = SteamSystemModelerTool::region2(boundaryTemperature, pressure);
122  specificEntropyLimit = boundaryProps.specificEntropy;
123  }
124 
125  // this if statement decides if you're in region one or three when you're near the boundary
126  if ( entropy < specificEntropyLimit ) {
127  if (pressure > SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_Tp) {
128  region13boundary = SteamProperties::waterPropertiesPressureTemperature(pressure, SteamSystemModelerTool::TEMPERATURE_Tp);
129  }
130 
131  if (pressure <= SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_Tp || entropy < region13boundary.specificEntropy) {
132  const double temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEntropyRegion1Exact(pressure, entropy);
133  return SteamSystemModelerTool::region1(temperature, pressure);
134  }
135  const double temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEntropyRegion3(pressure, entropy);
136  auto rv = SteamSystemModelerTool::region3(temperature, pressure);
137  rv.quality = -1; // TODO quality question - what should this do?
138  return rv;
139  }
140 
141  if ((pressure < SteamSystemModelerTool::PRESSURE_CRIT) && (entropy >= pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEntropy)
142  && (entropy <= pressureSatProps.gasSpecificEntropy)) {
143  const double quality = (entropy - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEntropy)
144  / (pressureSatProps.gasSpecificEntropy - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEntropy);
145 
146  const double specificVolume = (pressureSatProps.gasSpecificVolume - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificVolume) * quality + pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificVolume;
147 
148  return {
149  pressureSatProps.temperature, pressure, quality, specificVolume, 1 / specificVolume,
150  /* TODO question density -> 1 / (reducedPressure * gibbsPi * t * r / p / 1000.0)}, //density in kg/m³ */
151  (pressureSatProps.gasSpecificEnthalpy - pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy) * quality + pressureSatProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy,
152  entropy
153  };
154  }
155 
156  double temperature = 0;
157  if (pressure <= 4) {
158  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEntropyRegion2AExact(pressure, entropy);
159  } else {
160  if (entropy >= 5.85) {
161  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEntropyRegion2BExact(pressure, entropy);
162  } else {
163  temperature = SteamSystemModelerTool::backwardPressureEntropyRegion2CExact(pressure, entropy);
164  }
165  }
166 
167  return SteamSystemModelerTool::region2(temperature, pressure);
168 };
169 
170 SteamSystemModelerTool::SteamPropertiesOutput SteamProperties::waterPropertiesPressureQuality(const double pressure, const double quality) {
171  auto const satProps = SaturatedProperties(pressure, SaturatedTemperature(pressure).calculate()).calculate();
172 
173  const double specificVolume = satProps.gasSpecificVolume * quality + satProps.liquidSpecificVolume * (1 - quality);
174 
175  return {
176  satProps.temperature, satProps.pressure, quality, specificVolume, 1 / specificVolume,
177  satProps.gasSpecificEnthalpy * quality + satProps.liquidSpecificEnthalpy * (1 - quality),
178  satProps.gasSpecificEntropy * quality + satProps.liquidSpecificEntropy * (1 - quality)
179  };
180 };
